name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen Notes for Chrome - podcast search

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Official Listen Notes Chrome Extension. Search podcasts by topics. Suggest podcasts for websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search all podcasts and episodes right from your Chrome browser. Suggest podcasts for the website of current tab.
 
The fastest way to search podcasts:
- Search directly in the address bar (omnibar):  L + <Tab>
- Select text on a web page and right click to search from the context menu
- Search in the popup menu from the toolbar
 
If you have any questions, email us: hello@listennotes.com
